item.title: Shiba Inu’s BONE Token Secures Major Listing Ahead Shibarium Release

item.description:
Shiba Inu ecosystem’s governance token Bone ShibaSwap (BONE) secures listing on another major instant crypto platform before the anticipated launch of the long-awaited Layer-2 blockchain Shibarium in August. item.title: Bloomberg Analyst Weigh In On Spot Bitcoin ETF Approval By US SEC After XRP Ruling

item.description:
A spot Bitcoin ETF approval by the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) will be a regime shift that will boost enthusiasm for Bitcoin adoption across the globe. item.title: XRP Price Plummets 5% in 24 Hours – Is This The End of The Road for Bulls?
item.dc:creator: John Isige
item.description:
XRP price has started to give back part of the gains it has accrued this week. The token, native to Ripple’s payment system, exploded spectacularly following last week’s ruling which favored Ripple in the lawsuit against the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). item.title: Bitcoin Price Prediction: Unraveling the Explosive Impact of 21k BTC July Options Expiry
item.dc:creator: John Isige
item.description:
Bitcoin price carries on with its consolidation, seemingly ‘muted,’ with little to no action on the upside. item.title: FTX Sues Disgraced Founder SBF To Recoup $1 Billion of Doubtful Transactions
item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
On Thursday, July 20, the FTX trading slapped a new lawsuit against disgraced founder Sam Bankman-Fried and other former executives in an effort to recoup more than $1 billion in questionable transactions. item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
Terraform Labs is making headlines once again, this time for seeking access to FTX wallets as part of its defense in its ongoing fraud case.  A recent report revealed that Terraform Labs has sought permission from a Judge to subpoena information from the bankrupt FTX crypto exchange. item.title: SEC Chair Vows to Crackdown on AI if This Line is Crossed
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
The United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) enforcement actions know no bounds, and emerging technologies such as Artificial Intelligence (AI) now appear on the commission’s radar. SEC Chair on AI Regulation SEC Chairman Gary Gensler recently remarked that AI’s potential with respect to interference and disruption of market dynamics would attract the agency’s wrath.

The post SEC Chair Vows to Crackdown on AI if This Line is Crossed appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
The United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) enforcement actions know no bounds, and emerging technologies such as Artificial Intelligence (AI) now appear on the commission’s radar.
